column2: Reactionary liberal trash. Doesn't solve the problem. It's a systemic problem and this solution is like a band aid on a broken leg.
column3: This is something that will impact SMB who cannot afford paying 15$/hour wage
column4: It's possible benefits may be cut in exchange for higher wages, along with other benefits. Worth it?
column5: It's so high that it will definitely cost some needy people their jobs.
column6: Minimum wage will not just lead to robots. Minimum wage will lead to unionized robots. And that's a good thing.
column7: This will cause small businesses to go out of business.
column8: Good move. Will boost econy here
column9: One step towards a world where a basic minimum income will be the way developed nations must function as the need for human workers collapses vs populace that "needs a job."
column10: Guaranteed minimum income! Remove all the specific programs!
column11: Something needs to be done to address income inequality and this is a good if imperfect start
